mapper.insert: insert into opinion(debate_user_key, opinion_contents, opinion_regdate, opinion_like) values (#{debate_user_key}, #{opinion_contents}, now(), 0)
mapper.select: select opinion_key from opinion where debate_user_key in (select debate_user_key from debate_user where debate_room_key = #{debate_room_key}) order by opinion_regdate desc limit 0,1;

select * from opinion where opinion_regdate <= (select opinion_regdate from opinion where opinion_key = #{opinion_key}) and debate_user_key in (select debate_user_key from debate_user where debate_room_key = (select debate_room_key from debate_user where debate_user_key = (select debate_user_key from opinion where opinion_key = #{opinion_key}))) order by opinion_regdate desc limit 1,10;

select * from opinion where opinion_regdate <= (select opinion_regdate from opinion where opinion_key = #{opinion_key}) and debate_user_key in (select debate_user_key from debate_user where debate_room_key = (select debate_room_key from debate_user where debate_user_key = (select debate_user_key from opinion where opinion_key = #{opinion_key}))) order by opinion_regdate desc limit 0,10;
